name: introduction
title: Introduction
text:
hello and welcome! in Altered Domination the game where every concept is new
first of all you need to read the tutorial, so that you can understand how the game works by consulting the modes of the the game :
- singleplayer mode
- multiplayer mode
and then understanding the battle board and see how units behaive on it

name: Single player
title: Single Player Game
text:
in this mode you will pick a country to play as its ruller . there is 174 country available in this version, all of em are playable.
After picking a country and by clicking start a globe map will shows containing over 1001 cities.
every city has an income that will be added to the funds of the country every turn.
each city contains units and you can append units to it depending on the position of the city on the map and the cities cercling around it
each city can attack once a turn.
the city income depend on the mode yov chosen.
there is two modes ;
- GDP mode : the income of a city depends on the GDP of its country and the value of that city compared with the cities in the same country
- Equality mode : all the incoms of cities are equal to 100B$

name: Multiplayer
title: Multilayer Game
text:
In this mode you will be able to challenge players from arround the globe in a dual battle.
the matchmaking sevice will put players together depending on the criteria they specified in the multiplayer interface.
Not only that,you can also specify the ip adress of your friend and join him or you can create a battle and wait your freind to connect

name: Battle Rules
title: Battle
text:
- Rule Numero Uno! you should've wall placed your troops in the set formation phase
-after clicking promote ore waiting untill the enemy finish palcing , you have to choose your generals ONE GENERAL PER 7 UNITS and the general must be a soldier or it will be transforemed automaticlly
- click ready to start the battle the goal is to eleminate all the generals in a checkmate(ruller died in arabic) way , or should we say GENERALMATEX)
